metadata.Title: CVE-2016-8660 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: The XFS subsystem in the Linux kernel through 4.8.2 allows local users to cause a denial of service (fdatasync failure and system hang) by using the vfs syscall group in the trinity program, related to a "page lock order bug in the XFS seek hole/data implementation."

notes.Note: tyhicks> As of 2018-09-12, there is no upstream fix available and upstream disputes the security impact of this issue (see linux-fsdevel reference above)

criterions.comment: linux package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-27').
